result.execSummary:
The defendant Mario Alonso Garcia Silva was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Mario Alonso Garcia Silva is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Mario Alonso Garcia Silva was found guilty of Operating While Revoked (Rev due to alc/contr subst/refusal 4th+), an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 343.44(1)(b).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Defendant to pay $50 per mo for court costs commencing 6/1/2016. Failure to pay may result in a commitment of -1- day for every $25 owed.
Credit for time served, if any.
